title: Order Response
description: Json schema for an Order response, which is used for getting information about existing order. For usage details see curl examples in Order group

order_id.title: Order ID
order_id.description: An unique internal ID of an order.

member_id.title: Member ID
member_id.description: User ID who is assigned to the route

EXT_FIELD_first_name.title: First name
EXT_FIELD_first_name.description: The first name of the receiving address

EXT_FIELD_last_name.title: Last name
EXT_FIELD_last_name.description: The last name of the receiving address

EXT_FIELD_phone.title: Address phone number
EXT_FIELD_phone.description: The phone number for the address

EXT_FIELD_custom_data.title: Order custom data
EXT_FIELD_custom_data.description: A custom data of the order

address_city.title: Address city
address_city.description: The city the address is located in

address_state_id.title: Address state id
address_state_id.description: The state the address is located in

address_country_id.title: Address country id
address_country_id.description: The country the address is located in

address_zip.title: Address zip
address_zip.description: The zip code the address is located in

in_route_count.title: In route count
in_route_count.description: In how many routes is included address.

last_visited_timestamp.title: Last visited timestamp
last_visited_timestamp.description: When the last time an address was visited.

last_routed_timestamp.title: Last routed timestamp
last_routed_timestamp.description: When last time an address was included in a route.

local_time_window_start.title: Local time window start
local_time_window_start.description: When a time window was started.

local_time_window_end.title: Local time window end
local_time_window_end.description: When a time window was ended.

local_time_window_start_2.title: Local time window start 2
local_time_window_start_2.description: When second time window was started.

local_time_window_end_2.title: Local time window end 2
local_time_window_end_2.description: When second time window was ended.

service_time.title: Service time
service_time.description: Consumed service time at an address.

is_validated.title: Is validated
is_validated.description: If true, the order is validated.

is_pending.title: Is pending
is_pending.description: If true, the order is pending.

is_accepted.title: Is accepted
is_accepted.description: If true, the order is accepted.

is_started.title: Is started
is_started.description: If true, the order is started.

is_completed.title: Is completed
is_completed.description: If true, the order is completed.

visited_count.title: Visited Count
visited_count.description: How many times the order visited.

address_stop_type.title: Address stop type
address_stop_type.description: The type of stop that this is (DELIVERY,PICKUP,BREAK,MEETUP,SERVICE,VISIT,DRIVEBY)

tracking_number.title: Tracking Number
tracking_number.description: Systemwide unique code (chars<=255), which permits end-users (recipients) to track the status of their order
